comment: Prof. Cole was really awesome.  He's a cool dude, he is super helpful and really does his best to help everyone learn, even in a larger class.  All you have to do is ask!

The class is easy overall. Just make sure that diagrams you draw on microstation perfectly because little mistakes leads to points taken off. The professor is helpful and he's good at explaining it in detail and makes it clear but he goes over the concept fast so pay attention.
I like the class and Professor Cole makes it easy to learn.

Easy class. You wont learn too much. Some ppl had trouble. Always late and holds class late. Not organized. But im sure he curved my grade from a B to an A. very easy class, does have a drawing hw every class. Helps you on quiz/tests. Just ask

Very helpful prof., well-taught subject matter... Quite a bit of homework for a 2-credit-hour class, and his tests seemed to be a problem for students that did not pay attention in class, but as long as you show up and devote some effort, you'll breeze right through!

Prof. Cole is a very very very approachable and helpful prof.  By the sound of my friends' experiences w/ other EG profs., his class seems pretty nice and simple, straightfoward... Microstation is fine once you get used to it.  I never knew a thing about using Autocad and all this stuff, now, I can help myself in 3D drawings pretty fine. Great prof

The whole semester I was sure that I would get an A in the class and at the end when he gave all the work back, I ended up with a C. You HAVE to go to this class everyday or you will get behind. He's really nice and helpful and wants you to do well.
Easy class. All microstation. Almost impossible to get less than a B.
Great professor.Made class enjoyable.Very flexible with grading assignments too.
VERY EASY for engineering graphics 1210.  Probably easiest of all the teachers for this course.
